img.alt: Sikeston high school sophomore scores perfect on ACT

div.h3: Sikeston high school sophomore scores perfect on ACT
div.div:
For the first time in recorded history, a Sikeston sophomore scored perfectly on her ACT test.
Raghad Alkilani said this was her first official time taking the ACT.

div.div: The Sikeston Jaycees recently donated $8,000 to the Sikeston Public Schools Foundation. With this donation, the Sikeston High School Library will be able to purchase an additional zSpace Computer . . .

img.alt: New informational website launches for R-6 bond issue

div.h3: New informational website launches for R-6 bond issue
div.div:
A new website has launched to help explain the need and costs of a Sikeston R-6 bond issue that will be on the ballot in April.
The site, www.schools4sikeston.com, explains the $21-million bond . . .
